embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

replies.body:
Hey Warden,

We've got a fix coming to you shortly for all Ranked Headers.  

Thanks for keeping a close eye out!
i got bronze 3 after being silver 2 on one account and gold 5 on another. welcome to how riot screwed up the system again.
Rank is not the point of this thread. It's the overlapping text at the top of the client window. The category of the thread is 'Client Discussion'.
did i mention? i was at bronze 2 earlier in the day and now i'm bronze 3 because of silver-gold players against a bunch of bronze 4's on my team. i op.gg them too.
